entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 10:23 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: E 39 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of drizzle late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
